ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Medieval Overhaul Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.0[/h1] [i]This version of RimFantasy has been reworked and rebalanced to adhere to Medieval Overhaul standards. It is no longer modular and contains new/altered/removed content.[/i]
For the longest time, civilizations dismissed magic as wild fantasies and superstitious tribal beliefs. That is until one day, an incident occurred in a gemstone mine, which led to the discovery that gemstones have a natural affinity with magic, and could be imbued with magical energies to produce spectacular effects.
Since then, the value of gemstones reached unimaginable heights and can be commonly found in the most prosperous cities and in the hands of the most skilled warriors.
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Magical weapons with powers. [*]Magical furniture for lighting areas. [*]Magical furniture for regulating temperature. [*]Magical defences for protecting colonies. [/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colors[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Save Game Compatible [*][b][Incompatible - RimFantasy - Gemstones][/b] The Medieval Overhaul Edition supersedes the original series for usage with Medieval Overhaul. Will cause game breaking issues if used together. [*][b][Major Incompatibility - Simple Sidearms][/b] Overrides the way bladelink weapons work and breaks the no-bond mechanics of arcane weapons. <biocodeOnEquip> can be turned on in settings as a workaround, but will re-introduce the bonding mechanic. [/list]
[b]Balance & Bug Reports:[/b] Balance feedbacks are welcomed, please provide context when doing so. Bug reports must come with HugsLogs, join the Discord if you don't know how to generate one.
[h1][url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url][/h1] [url=https://ko-fi.com/sierra0001][img]https://i.imgur.com/SBiUpbW.png[/img][/url]
